title: (x) NY slab serif - hand drawn {Mike Y}
content:
Any help with id’ing this NY serif?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [NYTYPEFACE.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=NYTYPEFACE.jpg) | 16.87 KB |
author: armin

comments.content:
looks like clarendon, but the contrast is a little more dramatic…

———  
nc

Sounds like I am getting on a theme here, but I think these letters are customized. I don’t think they are from a font, or if they were, they were modified out of recognition with the original. This is really a logo design, I think. The stem on the Y is too short, and the N proportions and contrast are quite exaggerated. Perfect for this logo, but strange for any type uses, in my opinion.

- Mike Yanega
